text_1095817264.text:
RoboHelp Server will install now...
Thank you for registering for the 30-day trial, your download will now begin. Unzip the downloaded file and run 'Set-up.exe' to install RoboHelp Server.
Your 30-day trial will begin from the day you install the product.
